about_the_game:
Death is not the end.

The cemetery has been destroyed, and therefore the curse has weakened and the spirit has weakened.
Get out of the dungeon and the cemetery, and do not walk to unfamiliar ladies.

- Game location increased 5 times
- Is added weather effect
- As well as a few buns
detailed_description:
Death is not the end.

The cemetery has been destroyed, and therefore the curse has weakened and the spirit has weakened.
Get out of the dungeon and the cemetery, and do not walk to unfamiliar ladies.

- Game location increased 5 times
- Is added weather effect
- As well as a few buns
name: The Bad Gravedigger - Insurrection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series / AMD Radeon HD 4000 series 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 500 series / AMD Radeon HD 6000 series 1 GB VRAM.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Death is not the end.The cemetery has been destroyed, and therefore the curse has weakened and the spirit has weakened.Get out of the dungeon and the cemetery, and do not walk to unfamiliar ladies!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
